File 1.Title: Basic Ophthalmology Concepts
File 1.Content: Cover fundamental concepts such as anatomy of the eye, common eye conditions (e.g., myopia, hyperopia), basic eye care, and introductory information on eye diseases.
File 1.Format: Simple explanations, diagrams, and basic treatment approaches.

File 2.Title: Advanced Ophthalmologic Disorders
File 2.Content: In-depth information on complex eye diseases (e.g., glaucoma, macular degeneration), their pathophysiology, advanced diagnostic techniques, and current research.
File 2.Format: Detailed descriptions, latest research findings, and case studies.

File 3.Title: Ophthalmologic Surgeries and Procedures
File 3.Content: Detailed instructions on various eye surgeries (e.g., LASIK, cataract surgery), pre- and post-operative care, and surgical advancements.
File 3.Format: Step-by-step procedural information, surgical techniques, and care guidelines.

File 4.Title: Pharmacology in Ophthalmology
File 4.Content: Detailed information on drugs used in ophthalmology, including mechanism of action, dosage, side effects, and drug interactions.
File 4.Format: Drug profiles, clinical trial data, and usage guidelines.

File 5.Title: Pediatric Ophthalmology
File 5.Content: Specifics of eye care in children, common pediatric eye conditions, treatment approaches, and developmental aspects of pediatric vision.
File 5.Format: Child-focused explanations, treatment protocols, and parental guidance.

File 6.Title: Ophthalmologic Emergencies
File 6.Content: Protocols for handling eye emergencies, immediate treatments, and triage procedures.
File 6.Format: Quick reference guides, emergency care procedures, and decision trees.

File 7.Title: Ophthalmology Case Studies
File 7.Content: Real-world case studies to illustrate various eye conditions, treatment decisions, and outcomes.
File 7.Format: Detailed case descriptions, treatment choices, and lessons learned.

File 8.Title: Technological Advancements in Ophthalmology
File 8.Content: Latest technology in eye care, including diagnostic tools, surgical equipment, and future trends.
File 8.Format: Descriptions of technological innovations, their applications, and potential impact.
